class.name: CFFIOwnedValue
class.brief_description: Godot object that stores a pointer with managed memory, which is released automatically.
class.description: This object can be allocated using [method CFFIType.alloc]. This object is also returned by [CFFIFunction]s that return struct values.

method.name: get_base_address
method.description: Get base address pointer, alias for [code]offset_by(0)[/code].
